high_descs: Step back from the wall, and over to your right so that you are in front of the cardboard box on the floor.
Pick up the cardboard box on the floor, to the left of the dresser.
Turn around and go to the desk across from you.
Turn on the lamp in the back, right corner of the desk.
Turn right, Turn left, and face the box to the left of the green dresser.
Pick up the box to the left of the green dresser.
Turn around and move to the dresser next to the bed on the opposite side of the room.
Turn on the lamp on the dresser.
anns.task_desc: Turn on the lamp on the dresser to inspect the empty box.

high_descs: Walk forward to the cardboard box on the ground
Pick up the cardboard box from the ground
Turn around and walk up to the desk lamp
anns.task_desc: Examine the cardboard box under light of the desk lamp
